attributes.comment:
As a parent who is the middle of an international adoption, I have already paid my
fees for the I-600 A, petition to adopt an orphan. The cost to adopt internationally
is substantial as it is and I feel that an increase in a fee that is already so costly
would be detrimental to others who are considering adoption to increase their
family. There are so many families who feel called to take part in this wonderful
thing and I ask that you please reconsider raising the fees so that it is not such a
hardship for future families.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Amber M. Nelms
